name: Pick
description: A heavy mining tool essential for breaking through stone barriers and excavating hidden passages in muddy terrain. This versatile implement can shape marble sculptures and is awarded through the Small Axe Quest.

name: Rope
description: A sturdy climbing aid that allows adventurers to ascend through vertical shafts. This reliable tool can also be employed to haul fellow travelers, monsters, and objects up from lower levels.

name: Shovel
description: An indispensable excavation tool for any explorer's journey. Perfect for clearing loose rubble and burrowing through sandy desert terrain to uncover hidden treasures beneath.

name: Scythe
description: A curved farming blade that serves dual purposes as both harvesting equipment and makeshift weapon. Ideal for reaping wheat stalks in agricultural fields.

name: Trap
description: A mechanical snare device that damages enemies and adventurers upon contact without hindering their movement. Particularly effective for weakening formidable beasts during prolonged battles. Available from Beatrice in Edron.

name: Machete
description: A sharp jungle blade designed to hack through dense vegetation and overgrowth. Essential for clearing paths through wild foliage and tropical grasslands.

name: Fishing Rod
description: An angler's companion for catching aquatic creatures from rivers and seas. Regular practice with this equipment gradually improves your fishing proficiency over time.
